idea-plugin.name: LESS CSS Compiler
idea-plugin.description:
This plugin watches directories for changes to LESS files and compiles changed files to CSS.

NOTE: This plugin is ONLY compatible with IntelliJ IDEA 11.x.
It is NOT compatible with IntelliJ IDEA 10.x.

10.x compatibility is NOT planned for a future release.
